A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a stand alone movie it contains enough action to keep you involved. As part of the over all Star Wars arc it left me feeling lost. The feeling of emptiness after leaving the movie is the first I've ever felt in any of the Star Wars movies. Two new characters who are successful actors were a complete waste of time in a long movie. Sigh I can't even take the time that the others have to express how bad this is for a Star Wars movie.
